statements: DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_date < '2022-01-01' AND engagement_score > 50
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like' AND engagement_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 123 AND page_views < 5;
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE likes >= 10 AND time_stamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM content_performance WHERE shares_count > 500 AND views_count < 1000;
DELETE FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 101 AND user_role = 'admin';
